author: Sam-Harper
body:
This is the 80X flavour version as requested by x-pog of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/17909

It stores trk pt and eta as well as storing all high purity tracks including those which come from electrons. For more details see the 90X PR.

The average event size increase was measured using the /RelValTTbar_13/CMSSW_8_0_21-PU25ns_80X_mcRun2_asymptotic_2016_TrancheIV_v6_Tr4GT_v6-v1/GEN-SIM-RECO ttbar relval. 

Size increase 
patPackedCandidates_packedPFCandidates__PAT. 87539.3 15788.5
patPackedCandidates_lostTracks__PAT. 278.553 121.174

to

patPackedCandidates_packedPFCandidates__PAT. 94988 15849.3
patPackedCandidates_lostTracks__PAT. 1114.2 348.642
patPackedCandidates_lostTracks_eleTracks_PAT. 201.602 90.3766

for  a total size of ~400 bytes, of which about half of which is due to <1 GeV high purity tracks been added.
title: Improving Track Information in miniAOD : 80X
